thread.title: Drag racer killed in crash at Letcher County race track
thread.title_full: Drag racer killed in crash at Letcher County race track

title: Drag racer killed in crash at Letcher County race track
text:
Drag racer killed in crash at Letcher County race track By -   
ISOM, Ky. (AP) - A Pike County man has died after a crash at the Mountain Motor Speedway in Isom. 
Authorities tell local media that 61-year-old Willard M. Hicks of Shelby Gap was driving in a drag race Saturday evening, lost control of his vehicle, left the track and struck a tree. 
Hicks was pronounced dead at a local hospital. No one else was injured in the crash. 
Police said it was the first fatal wreck at the speedway in decades.
